title: why arent inhib towers like TT nexus towers?
body:
title ^

for more explanation go dive a TT nexus tower

replies.body:
I wish Summoner's Rift had Twisted Treeline towers.

Get caught in one bit of crowd control under that turret aggro and your health goes on vacation.

The last big patch did buff towers a lot, but really.. They are sort of trivial now. 

Honestly, i think they should focus on champions if that champion is damaged by another champion while under the turret, with a slight delay to allow a chance for escape. Too many tanks just walk under tower and beat you shitless over and over, by the time the turret even targets them, they killed you, and are dancing away with 60% hp left. - at lv6, no less.
